TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IVsaCodeItem implements class Microsoft.Vsa.IVsaItem

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because it is being deprecated in Visual Studio 2005; there will be no replacement for this feature. Please see the ICodeCompiler documentation for additional help.")

summary.span: 代表要由指令碼引擎編譯的程式碼項目。

span.span: Represents a code item to be compiled by the script engine.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的程式碼項目可以包含類別、 模組或其他原始程式文字。The specified code item can contain classes, modules, or other source text. 不不需要呼叫任何成員 IVsaCodeItem 介面的任何權限。No permissions are required for calling any members of the IVsaCodeItem interface. 指令碼引擎會實作這個介面，以便新增程式碼項目。The script engine implements this interface in order to add code items.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddEventSource (string eventSourceName, string eventSourceType);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddEventSource(string eventSourceName, string eventSourceType) cil managed
Public Sub AddEventSource (eventSourceName As String, eventSourceType As String)
public: void AddEventSource(System::String ^ eventSourceName, System::String ^ eventSourceType);
abstract member AddEventSource : string * string -> unit

param.name: eventSourceName
param.span: 事件來源的程式設計名稱。

span.span: A programmatic name of the event source.
The type name of the event source.

summary.span: 將事件來源加入程式碼項目。

span.span: Adds an event source to the code item.

summary.span: 程式碼項目會使用事件來源，藉由呼叫主機實作的 IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance 方法將事件連結至具名事件來源。

span.span: The code item uses the event source to hook up an event to the named event source by calling the IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance method, which is implemented by the host.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指令碼引擎會使用 AddEventSource 方法所提供的資訊連結至具名的事件來源的事件。The script engine uses information provided by the AddEventSource method to hook up events to the named event source. 它會透過呼叫由主機所實作的 IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance 方法取得事件來源。It obtains event sources by calling the IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance method, which is implemented by the host. AddEventSource 方法會建立處理主機提供的物件所引發的事件類別。The AddEventSource method creates a class that handles events raised by a host-provided object. > [!NOTE] > JScript.NET 指令碼引擎不支援這個方法。The JScript .NET script engine does not support this method. 在其中 JScript.NET 引擎必須連結事件的情況下，您必須使用達成全域項目。In cases where the JScript .NET engine must hook up an event, you must do so using a global item. 而不是事件來源、 JScript.NET 引擎會使用 AppGlobal 項目類型。Rather than event sources, the JScript .NET engine uses AppGlobal item types. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 VsaItemType。For more information, see VsaItemType. 中的程式碼項目中，您可以存取事件來源物件名稱，和之後存取，您可以撰寫對物件的事件處理常式。Within the code item, you can access the event source object by name, and, once accessed, you can write event handlers against the object. 事件來源類型會傳遞為字串，而不是型別物件，以便實作的事件來源的未受管理的主機。The event source type is passed as a string rather than as a Type object to facilitate implementing event sources by unmanaged hosts. 編譯器會使用 eventSourceType 參數繫結至型別所提供的方法。The compiler uses the eventSourceType parameter to bind to methods provided by the type. 它也會使用更新版本時，指令碼引擎會呼叫要求的型別物件的執行個體的 IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance 方法。It is also used later when the script engine calls the IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance method to request an instance of the Type object. 如需指令碼引擎的事件連結機制的詳細資訊，請參閱的 IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance 方法。For more information about the mechanisms for hooking up events for the script engine, see the IVsaSite.GetEventSourceInstance method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AppendSourceText(string text) cil managed

param.name: text
param.span: 要附加至程式碼項目的文字。

span.span: The text to be appended to the code item.

summary.span: 將指定的文字附加至程式碼項目結尾。

span.span: Appends specified text to the end of the code item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 附加的原始程式文字不會驗證。Appended source text is not subjected to validation. 基於這個理由，錯誤，如果有的話，就會出現在下一步 IVsaEngine.Compile 方法呼叫。For this reason, errors, if any, will surface on the next call to the IVsaEngine.Compile method. 附加的原始程式文字提供以單一字串。The appended source text is provided as a single string. 字串需要任何格式，您必須自行提供。Should the string require any formatting, you must provide this yourself.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CodeDOM As CodeObject
public: property System::CodeDom::CodeObject ^ CodeDOM { System::CodeDom::CodeObject ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得程式碼項目中所代表的程式碼文件物件模型 (CodeDOM)。

span.span: Gets the code document object model (CodeDOM) represented in the code item.

value.span: 傳回程式碼項目的 CodeDOM。

span.span: Returns the CodeDOM for the code item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CodeDOM 屬性通常會產生指令碼引擎的編譯步驟的一部分，因此它後就無法使用之前 IVsaEngine.Compile 方法的呼叫。The CodeDOM property is typically generated as part of the compilation step of the script engine, so it is not available until after a call to the IVsaEngine.Compile method. 某些 VSA 實作可能是能夠以動態方式，提供 CodeDOM，而不需要明確的編譯步驟中，但主機不能依賴此行為。Some VSA implementations may be able to provide the CodeDOM dynamically, without the need for an explicit compilation step, but hosts cannot rely on this behavior. 某些指令碼引擎，比方說，JScript.NET 指令碼引擎，不支援這種行為。Some script engines, for example, the JScript .NET script engine, do not support this behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void RemoveEventSource(string eventSourceName) cil managed

param.name: eventSourceName
param.span: 要移除的事件來源程式設計名稱。

span.span: The programmatic name of the event source to be removed.

summary.span: 從程式碼項目中移除指定的事件來源。

span.span: Removes the specified event source from the code item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 移除的事件來源並不會從原始程式文字移除基礎的事件處理常式。Removing an event source does not remove the underlying event handler from source text. 相反地，事件不會再引發的事件處理常式的通知。Rather, events no longer raise notifications to the event handler. 因此，您會收到編譯器錯誤，如果您刪除事件來源，但保留基礎函式的原始程式碼中。Therefore, you will get a compiler error if you delete an event source but leave the underlying function in the source code.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SourceText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SourceText : string with get, set

summary.span: 設定或取得指定程式碼項目的文字，包含任何自動產生的程式碼。

span.span: Sets or gets the text of a specified code item, including auto-generated code, if any.

value.span: 傳回程式碼項目的原始程式文字。

span.span: Returns the source text of the code item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您設定此屬性時，文字不會驗證。When you set this property, the text is not subjected to validation. 基於這個理由，錯誤，如果有的話，就會出現在下一步 IVsaEngine.Compile 方法呼叫。For this reason, errors, if any, will surface on the next call to the IVsaEngine.Compile method. SourceText 屬性會傳回一個龐大的字串，包括格式化字元，例如歸位字元在原始程式文字傳回。The SourceText property returns the source text in one large string, including formatting characters such as carriage returns. 若要取得此屬性，引擎必須未關閉。To get this property the engine must not be closed. 若要設定此屬性，引擎必須未關閉，而且不能執行引擎。To set this property the engine must not be closed, and the engine must not be running.
